sentences.sContent: You can do that, but I find the syntax kind of opaque.
sentences.sContent_eng: You can do that, but I find the syntax kind of opaque.
sentences.sCn: 您可以这样做，但是我发现语法有些不透明。

sentences.sContent: A second laser can then be fired through the normally opaque sodium; it passes through, but not much faster than a racehorse can run.
sentences.sContent_eng: A second laser can then be fired through the normally opaque sodium; it passes through, but not much faster than a racehorse can run.
sentences.sCn: 然后，通过通常不透明的钠发射第二束激光；光线虽能通过, 但它运动的速度不会比一匹赛马更快。

sentences.sContent: Unlike the other two, this is not an opaque type; its structure is documented.
sentences.sContent_eng: Unlike the other two, this is not an opaque type; its structure is documented.
sentences.sCn: 与另外两个数据类型不同，这是一个透明的类型；其结构在文档中有介绍。

synos.tran: [物]不透明的；不传热的；迟钝的

remMethod.val: opa(cus)(蔽光的) + que → 不透明的
